item.title: “Wi-Fi: No Hardware Installed“ - What to do?
item.description: Over the past couple of weeks I had been getting an error with the Wi-fi on my Macbook Air (2017). There was an ‘x’ in the Wi-fi symbol and on clicking the icon, the message read “Wi-Fi: No Hardware Installed”.
